questions.question_text:
The admin at Universal Containers is attempting to retire a Product that is being replaced by a newer version, but they are receiving an error because the Product is associated to an Opportunity.

What should the consultant recommend to resolve the issue most efficiently?

choices.C: Edit the Product record and uncheck the Active field.
choices.D: Create a Flow to automatically delete the Product from the Price Book.
choices.A: Archive the Product or Price Book and each related Price Book entry.
choices.B: Remove the related Product from all Opportunities and Quotes.

choices.A: Create one Dashboard folder for all regions for sales and leadership teams with View access.
choices.D: Create one Dashboard folder for all regional sales teams and one Dashboard folder for the leadership team.
choices.C: Create region-based sales groups, one leadership group, and one Dashboard folder with View access.
choices.B: Create Dashboard folders for each regional sales team and one Dashboard folder for the leadership team.

discussion.content:
B
Each region should only have access to its own region and leadership to global.

Selected Answer: C
C is it

questions.question_text:
The Cloud Kicks global sales teams are distributed across regions. Sales leadership wants to give access to dashboards based on region. For example, users within the region should have access to regional dashboards, while the leadership team should have access to global dashboards.

What should the consultant recommend to meet this requirement?

Cloud Kicks needs to implement a group of Campaigns that are related to a specific marketing initiative to report on success.

What should a consultant recommend to meet the requirement?

choices.B: Create a custom Campaign Group object.
choices.C: Use a Marketing dashboard from the AppExchange.
choices.D: Create a custom Campaign Purpose field.
choices.A: Use the existing Parent Campaign field.

choices.C: The Opportunity's Account will be implicitly Read for the team.
choices.D: Account should be set to Public Read first.
choices.B: Opportunity should be set to Public Read/Write first.
choices.A: The Opportunity will be implicitly Write for the team.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks has organization-wide defaults set to Private for Account.

With the rollout of Opportunity Teams, what should a consultant consider?

discussion.content: C is correct: Your Salesforce admin can set the organization-wide default access for accounts and opportunities to Private. In that case, if you give team members access to an individual opportunity, those users gain read-only access to accounts on the opportunity. https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.salesteam_def.htm&type=5
